org.epics.pvData.misc
Class TimerFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.epics.pvData.misc.TimerFactory

public class TimerFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Factory that creates a Timer. This implementation of a Timer provides the following features not provided by java.util.Timer 1) Timer thread has a priority and 2) A TimerNode can be reused.

Author:
mrk
